item.title: Red Light exiting JD Gym stuck on, 13th June
item.description:
This evening dropped daughter at the gym. When exiting the gym the green light did not trigger for 3 cycles of the lights. Due to this I believed that it was broken so had to turn left on red [even though I needed to go right] or believed I would still be there now. I cut through Tesco to come back up Gloucester Road as was my original intention and the light seemed to be working again. I think therefore the syncing of the light needs adjustment [understand that it was rush hour] as others could make the same assessment. Exiting the gym is very diffficult due to the lights syncing and traffic turning right from Waitrose and heading down Gloucester Road jumping through amber/red.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Gloucester Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous decline in visibility, 13th June
item.description:
Please do not reject this appeal again, the junction is now unsafe and it needs attention. The photos do not do justice to what is a bad situation. People drive beyond 30mph on this stretch. The long grass and weeds on the bit between the stadium building and junction is blocking the view of oncoming traffic and there is not sufficient distance to see cars coming up in time when pulling out safely. Lots of cars go too fast here and a crash will happen without a simple strimming under the trees to give drivers 100yd view, not 30yd. If you also see the second photo, the view through the individual tree branches is reduced when looking north. A few lower branches need chopping off. All this is a few hours work. It has to be done and no longer delayed or deemed unnecessary. Please stop a deadly accident for cars or pedestrians using the road to cross. Hundreds of people do the park run and countless people from the residential areas use this part of the road; visibility should be of the utmost importance. I implore you to do the work on the weeds immediately.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tommy Taylors Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic mirror on lamp post needs to be replaced, 13th June
item.description:
The traffic mirror on the lamp post at the T junction of Naunton Lane & Naunton Park Road has not been replaced since being damaged in March 2024. I believe, without this mirror being replaced, it is an accident waiting to happen for cars turning right out of Naunton Park Road onto Naunton Lane (towards Thirlestaine Road). Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Naunton Lane, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
